description: Operation in the Amazon OpenSearch Service API for associating multiple packages with a domain simultaneously.

parameters.name: PackageList
parameters.description: A list of packages and their prerequisites to be associated with a domain. (dict) --- Details of a package that is associated with a domain. Internal ID of the package that you want to associate with a domain. PrerequisitePackageIDList (list) --- List of package IDs that must be linked to the domain before or simultaneously with the package association. (string) --- AssociationConfiguration (dict) --- The configuration parameters for associating the package with a domain. KeyStoreAccessOption (dict) --- The configuration parameters to enable accessing the key store required by the package. KeyAccessRoleArn (string) --- Role ARN to access the KeyStore Key This indicates whether Key Store access is enabled.

nested_params.name: PackageID
nested_params.description: Internal ID of the package that you want to associate with a domain.

nested_params.name: PrerequisitePackageIDList
nested_params.description: List of package IDs that must be linked to the domain before or simultaneously with the package association.

nested_params.name: AssociationConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configuration parameters for associating the package with a domain.

nested_params.name: KeyStoreAccessOption
nested_params.description: The configuration parameters to enable accessing the key store required by the package.

nested_params.name: KeyAccessRoleArn
nested_params.description: Role ARN to access the KeyStore Key.

nested_params.name: KeyStoreAccessEnabled
nested_params.description: This indicates whether Key Store access is enabled.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of an OpenSearch Service domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: DomainPackageDetailsList
nested_items.description: List of information about packages that are associated with a domain.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the package association status.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: Name of the domain that the package is associated with.

nested_items.name: PackageVersion
nested_items.description: The current version of the package.

nested_items.name: PrerequisitePackageIDList
nested_items.description: A list of package IDs that must be associated with the domain before or with the package can be associated.

nested_items.name: ReferencePath
nested_items.description: The relative path of the package on the OpenSearch Service cluster nodes. This is synonym_path when the package is for synonym files.

nested_items.name: ErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Additional information if the package is in an error state. Null otherwise.

nested_items.name: ErrorType
nested_items.description: The type of error that occurred.

nested_items.name: AssociationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for associating a package with an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

nested_items.name: KeyStoreAccessOption
nested_items.description: The configuration parameters to enable accessing the key store required by the package.

nested_items.name: KeyAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: Role ARN to access the KeyStore Key.

nested_items.name: KeyStoreAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: This indicates whether Key Store access is enabled.
